vep_impact.title: vep_impact
vep_impact.description: Subjective impact classification of consequence type

vep_feature_type.title: vep_feature_type
vep_feature_type.description: Type of feature - Transcript, RegulatoryFeature or MotifFeature

vep_biotype.title: vep_biotype
vep_biotype.description: Biotype of transcript or regulatory feature

vep_cdna_position.title: vep_cdna_position
vep_cdna_position.description: Relative position of base pair in cDNA sequence

vep_cds_position.title: vep_cds_position
vep_cds_position.description: Relative position of base pair in coding sequence

vep_protein_position.title: vep_protein_position
vep_protein_position.description: Relative position of amino acid in protein

vep_distance.title: vep_distance
vep_distance.description: Shortest distance from variant to transcript

vep_hgnc_id.title: vep_hgnc_id
vep_hgnc_id.description: Stable identifer of HGNC gene symbol

vep_canonical.title: vep_canonical
vep_canonical.description: Indicates if transcript is canonical for this gene

vep_ccds.title: vep_ccds
vep_ccds.description: Indicates if transcript is a CCDS transcript

items.title: vep_domains
items.description: The source and identifer of any overlapping protein domains

vep_mirna.title: vep_mirna
vep_mirna.description: SO terms of overlapped miRNA secondary structure feature(s)

vep_hgvs_offset.title: vep_hgvs_offset
vep_hgvs_offset.description: Indicates by how many bases the HGVS notations for this variant have been shifted

vep_clin_sig.title: vep_clin_sig
vep_clin_sig.description: ClinVar clinical significance of the dbSNP variant

items.title: vep_pheno
items.description: Indicates if existing variant(s) is associated with a phenotype, disease or trait; multiple values correspond to multiple variants

items.title: vep_pubmed
items.description: Pubmed ID(s) of publications that cite existing variant

vep_motif_name.title: vep_motif_name
vep_motif_name.description: The source and identifier of a transcription factor binding profile (TFBP) aligned at this position

vep_motif_pos.title: vep_motif_pos
vep_motif_pos.description: The relative position of the variation in the aligned TFBP

vep_high_inf_pos.title: vep_high_inf_pos
vep_high_inf_pos.description: A flag indicating if the variant falls in a high information position of the TFBP

vep_motif_score_change.title: vep_motif_score_change
vep_motif_score_change.description: The difference in motif score of the reference and variant sequences for the TFBP

vep_tssdistance.title: vep_tssdistance
vep_tssdistance.description: Distance from the transcription start site

max_pop_af_af_popmax.title: max_pop_af_af_popmax
max_pop_af_af_popmax.description: maximum population allele frequency from gnomAD gnome v3.0

uk10k_an.title: uk10k_an
uk10k_an.description: Total number of alleles in called genotypes

uk10k_af_afr.title: uk10k_af_afr
uk10k_af_afr.description: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Allele Frequency in African population (YRI,LWK,ASW)

uk10k_af_amr.title: uk10k_af_amr
uk10k_af_amr.description: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Allele Frequency in American population (MXL,CLM,PUR)

uk10k_af_asn.title: uk10k_af_asn
uk10k_af_asn.description: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Allele Frequency in Asian population (CHB,CHS,JPT)

uk10k_af_eur.title: uk10k_af_eur
uk10k_af_eur.description: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Allele Frequency in European population (CEU,TSI,FIN,GBR,IBS)

uk10k_esp_maf.title: uk10k_esp_maf
uk10k_esp_maf.description: Minor allele frequecy in percent for European American, African American and All populations in the NHLBI Exome Sequencing Project (ESP)

nested_repeats_score.title: nested_repeats_score
nested_repeats_score.description: Average of fragment identity scores, transformed into 0..1000 range for shading

clinvar_clndn.title: clinvar_clndn
clinvar_clndn.description: ClinVar's preferred disease name for the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB

items.title: clinvar_clndn
items.description: ClinVar's preferred disease name for the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB

clinvar_clndnincl.title: clinvar_clndnincl
clinvar_clndnincl.description: For included Variant : ClinVar's preferred disease name for the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB

clinvar_clndisdb.title: clinvar_clndisdb
clinvar_clndisdb.description: Tag-value pairs of disease database name and identifier, e.g. OMIM:NNNNNN

clinvar_clndisdbincl.title: clinvar_clndisdbincl
clinvar_clndisdbincl.description: For included Variant: Tag-value pairs of disease database name and identifier, e.g. OMIM:NNNNNN

clinvar_clnhgvs.title: clinvar_clnhgvs
clinvar_clnhgvs.description: Top-level (primary assembly, alt, or patch) HGVS expression.

clinvar_clnrevstat.title: clinvar_clnrevstat
clinvar_clnrevstat.description: ClinVar review status for the Variation ID

items.title: clinvar_clnrevstat
items.description: ClinVar review status for the Variation ID

clinvar_clnsig.title: clinvar_clnsig
clinvar_clnsig.description: Clinical significance for this single variant

clinvar_clnsigconf.title: clinvar_clnsigconf
clinvar_clnsigconf.description: Conflicting clinical significance for this single variant

items.title: clinvar_clnsigconf
items.description: Conflicting clinical significance for this single variant

clinvar_clnsigincl.title: clinvar_clnsigincl
clinvar_clnsigincl.description: Clinical significance for a haplotype or genotype that includes this variant. Reported as pairs of VariationID:clinical significance.

clinvar_clnvcso.title: clinvar_clnvcso
clinvar_clnvcso.description: Sequence Ontology id for variant type

clinvar_clnvi.title: clinvar_clnvi
clinvar_clnvi.description: the variant's clinical sources reported as tag-value pairs of database and variant identifier

clinvar_geneinfo.title: clinvar_geneinfo
clinvar_geneinfo.description: Gene(s) for the variant reported as gene symbol:gene id. The gene symbol and id are delimited by a colon (:) and each pair is delimited by a vertical bar (|)

clinvar_mc.title: clinvar_mc
clinvar_mc.description: comma separated list of molecular consequence in the form of Sequence Ontology ID|molecular_consequence

clinvar_origin.title: clinvar_origin
clinvar_origin.description: Allele origin. One or more of the following values may be added: 0 - unknown; 1 - germline; 2 - somatic; 4 - inherited; 8 - paternal; 16 - maternal; 32 - de-novo; 64 - biparental; 128 - uniparental; 256 - not-tested; 512 - tested-inconclusive; 1073741824 - other

clinvar_ssr.title: clinvar_ssr
clinvar_ssr.description: Variant Suspect Reason Codes. One or more of the following values may be added: 0 - unspecified, 1 - Paralog, 2 - byEST, 4 - oldAlign, 8 - Para_EST, 16 - 1kg_failed, 1024 - other

cosmic_genomic_mutation_id.title: cosmic_genomic_mutation_id
cosmic_genomic_mutation_id.description: Genomic mutation identifier (COSV) to indicate the definitive position of the variant on the genome. This identifier is trackable and stable between different versions of the release.

cosmic_legacy_mutation_id.title: cosmic_legacy_mutation_id
cosmic_legacy_mutation_id.description: Legacy mutation identifier (COSM) that will represent existing COSM mutation identifiers.

cosmic_mutation_id.title: cosmic_mutation_id
cosmic_mutation_id.description: An internal mutation identifier to uniquely represent each mutation on a specific transcript on a given assembly build.

cosmic_transcript_id.title: cosmic_transcript_id
cosmic_transcript_id.description: The transcript identifier of the gene.

cosmic_primary_site.title: cosmic_primary_site
cosmic_primary_site.description: The primary tissue/cancer from which the sample originated. More details on the tissue classification are avaliable from here. In COSMIC we have standard classification system for tissue types and sub types because they vary a lot between different papers.

cosmic_site_subtype_1.title: cosmic_site_subtype_1
cosmic_site_subtype_1.description: Further sub classification (level 1) of the samples tissue of origin.

cosmic_site_subtype_2.title: cosmic_site_subtype_2
cosmic_site_subtype_2.description: Further sub classification (level 2) of the samples tissue of origin.

cosmic_site_subtype_3.title: cosmic_site_subtype_3
cosmic_site_subtype_3.description: Further sub classification (level 3) of the samples tissue of origin.

cosmic_primary_histology.title: cosmic_primary_histology
cosmic_primary_histology.description: The histological classification of the sample.

cosmic_histology_subtype_1.title: cosmic_histology_subtype_1
cosmic_histology_subtype_1.description: Further histological classification (level 1) of the sample.

cosmic_histology_subtype_2.title: cosmic_histology_subtype_2
cosmic_histology_subtype_2.description: Further histological classification (level 2) of the sample.

cosmic_histology_subtype_3.title: cosmic_histology_subtype_3
cosmic_histology_subtype_3.description: Further histological classification (level 3) of the sample.

cosmic_mutation_cds.title: cosmic_mutation_cds
cosmic_mutation_cds.description: The change that has occurred in the nucleotide sequence. Formatting is identical to the method used for the peptide sequence.

cosmic_mutation_aa.title: cosmic_mutation_aa
cosmic_mutation_aa.description: The change that has occurred in the peptide sequence. Formatting is based on the recommendations made by the Human Genome Variation Society. The description of each type can be found by following the link to Mutation Overview page.

cosmic_mutation_description.title: cosmic_mutation_description
cosmic_mutation_description.description: Type of mutation at the amino acid level (substitution, deletion, insertion, complex, fusion, unknown etc.)

items.title: cosmic_mutation_description
items.description: Type of mutation at the amino acid level (substitution, deletion, insertion, complex, fusion, unknown etc.)

cosmic_mutation_zygosity.title: cosmic_mutation_zygosity
cosmic_mutation_zygosity.description: Information on whether the mutation was reported to be homozygous , heterozygous or unknown within the sample.

cosmic_loh.title: cosmic_loh
cosmic_loh.description: LOH Information on whether the gene was reported to have loss of heterozygosity in the sample: yes, no or unknown.

cosmic_mutation_genome_position.title: cosmic_mutation_genome_position
cosmic_mutation_genome_position.description: The genomic coordinates of the mutation.

cosmic_resistance_mutation.title: cosmic_resistance_mutation
cosmic_resistance_mutation.description: mutation confers drug resistance (see CosmicResistanceMutations.tsv.gz for gene/drug details).

cosmic_mutation_somatic_status.title: cosmic_mutation_somatic_status
cosmic_mutation_somatic_status.description: Information on whether the sample was reported to be Confirmed Somatic, Previously Reported or Variant of unknown origin

cosmic_pubmed_pmid.title: cosmic_pubmed_pmid
cosmic_pubmed_pmid.description: The PUBMED ID for the paper that the sample was noted in, linking to pubmed to provide more details of the publication.

cosmic_id_study.title: cosmic_id_study
cosmic_id_study.description: Lists the unique Ids of studies that have involved this sample.

cosmic_tumour_origin.title: cosmic_tumour_origin
cosmic_tumour_origin.description: Describes where the sample has originated from including the tumour type.
